attributes.action: Recall parliament to declare a national emergency regarding illegal immigration
attributes.additional_details: By declaring a national emergency the government will be able to take measures that will protect the public and secure our borders something that they are currently not doing
attributes.background: It is clear that the policies the government have put into place are not working and numbers of illegal migrants are increasing on a daily basis. This is a national security issue and shows the government has not secured our borders and is failing to protect its citizens.

rejection.details:
It is not clear what you mean in regards to declaring a national emergency and what sort of impact you would like this to have.

You could start petition calling for the Government to be given emergency powers to address illegal immigration, if that's what you'd like.
